properties.entry: SELECT M_CODE ,M_TITLE ,M_GENRE ,M_DIRECTOR ,M_DATE ,M_COUNTRY ,M_IMAGE ,M_SUMMARY ,M_RATING ,M_GRADE ,STATUS FROM MOVIE WHERE M_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND M_GENRE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT M_CODE ,M_TITLE ,M_GENRE ,M_DIRECTOR ,M_DATE ,M_COUNTRY ,M_IMAGE ,M_SUMMARY ,M_RATING ,M_GRADE ,STATUS FROM MOVIE WHERE M_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND M_GENRE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY M_DATE DESC

SELECT M_CODE ,M_TITLE ,M_GENRE ,M_DIRECTOR ,M_DATE ,M_COUNTRY ,M_IMAGE ,M_SUMMARY ,M_RATING ,M_GRADE ,STATUS FROM MOVIE WHERE M_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' AND M_GENRE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY M_GRADE DESC
